Despite the growths, the thyroid's function is often normal. Rarely, individuals with DICER1 syndrome develop thyroid cancer (thyroid carcinoma).",GHR,DICER1 syndrome
How many people are affected by DICER1 syndrome ?,DICER1 syndrome is a rare condition; its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,DICER1 syndrome
